text.text: How do I access the facility audit trail?

text: To access the facility audit trail, you can click "Facilities" on the navigation bar and then select the facility name on the list. The audit trail is located next to the "Notes" tab. To access the company audit trail, you can click "Analytics" on the navigation bar and then click "Audit Trail".

text.text: Where can I find the audit trail tab for a facility?

text: To access the facility audit trail, you can click "Facilities" on the navigation bar and then select the facility name on the list. The audit trail is located next to the "Notes" tab.

text.text: What information does the audit trail table display?

text: The audit trail table displays the following information: Date, User, Description, Details. The audit trail records entries in the following cases: Edits to the facility details such as Name. The audit trail also records payments, claim removals, and HCPCS contract rate changes.

text.text: Can you explain the columns present in the facility audit trail?

text: The facility audit trail also records payments, claim removals, and HCPCS contract rate changes.

text.text: When are entries recorded in the facility audit trail?

text: Entries are recorded in the facility audit trail in the following cases: Edits to the facility details such as Name. The audit trail also records payments, claim removals, and HCPCS contract rate changes.

text.text: What types of edits to facility details are recorded in the audit trail?

text: Edits to the following facility details are recorded in the audit trail: Address, Designation, Phone number, NPI, State ID, PTAN, Calculation method, Percentage, Contracted price per unit, Up to X loaded miles amount, Over X loaded miles amount, Loaded miles, Mileage to or from facility.

text.text: How does the audit trail capture changes in HCPCS contract rates?

text: The audit trail captures changes in HCPCS contract rates by recording the following information: Calculation method, Percentage, Contracted price per unit, Up to X loaded miles amount, Over X loaded miles amount, Loaded miles, Mileage to or from facility.

text.text: What details are included in the audit trail for mileage contracted changes?

text: The audit trail also records payments, claim removals, and HCPCS contract rate changes.

text.text: How are payments reflected in the facility audit trail?

text: When a payment is posted, the dollar amount is a link to the transaction. Claim removals are also recorded in the audit trail.

text.text: What information is provided when a payment is posted in the audit trail?

text: The audit trail also records edits to the facility details, such as name, address, designation, phone number, NPI, state ID, PTAN.

text.text: When a claim is removed from a facility invoice, what details are recorded in the audit trail?

text: When a claim is removed from a facility invoice, the audit trail records the following details:

text.text: Is there a distinction made for claim removal entries in the audit trail?

text: If available, the invoice number will display. If it is not available, the invoice date will display.

text.text: Can I access specific details regarding claim removal entries in the audit trail?

text: To get to the company Audit Trail, click Analytics on the navigation bar and then click Audit Trail.

text.text: How can I identify which user made changes recorded in the facility audit trail?

text: The facility audit trail records entries in the following cases: Edits to the facility details such as: Name, Address, Designation, Phone number, NPI, State ID, PTAN, HCPCS contract rate change, Calculation method, Percentage, Contracted price per unit, Up to X loaded miles amount, Over X loaded miles amount, Mileage contracted changes, Loaded miles, Mileage to or from facility, Payments, When a payment is posted.

text.text: Is there a timestamp associated with entries in the facility audit trail?

text: The audit trail table contains the following columns of information: Date, User, Description, Details.

text.text: Are there any limitations on the duration for which the audit trail records information?

text: Each facility has its own audit trail. The audit trail is located next to the Notes tab on the facility page. To get to this page, on the navigation bar click Facilities and then select the facility name on the list.

text.text: Can I filter the audit trail to view specific types of entries?

text: To see the claim audit trail, you can enter the claim number in Search and then click the Audit trail tab. To see the account audit trail, you can enter the patient's account number in Search and then click the Audit trail tab.

text.text: How frequently is the facility audit trail updated?

text: The facility audit trail is updated when there are edits to the facility details such as name, address, phone number, NPI, state ID, PTAN, HCPCS contract rate change, calculation method, percentage, contracted price per unit, loaded miles, mileage to or from facility, payments, claim removals.

text.text: Can I export the facility audit trail data for further analysis?

text: To get to the company Audit Trail, click Analytics on the navigation bar and then click Audit Trail.

text.text: What steps should I take if I need to investigate a specific entry in the audit trail?

text: To see the claim audit trail, you can enter the claim number in Search and then click the Audit trail tab. To see the account audit trail, you can enter the patient's account number in Search and then click the Audit trail tab.

text.text: what does the Audit Trail table contain?

text: The Audit Trail table contains the following columns of information: Date, User, Description, Details

text.text: what happens When a payment is posted?

text: When a payment is posted, the unallocated amount should read zero. Once the unallocated amount reads zero, you can click Post transaction.

text.text: in what cases does Audit Trail records entries?

text: The Audit Trail records entries in the following cases: Edits to the facility details such as: Name, Address, Designation, Phone number, NPI, State ID, PTAN, HCPCS contract rate change, Calculation method, Percentage, Contracted price per unit, Up to X loaded miles amount, Over X loaded miles amount, Loaded miles, Mileage to or from facility, Payments, When a payment is posted, Claim removals.
